translations: n．枯萎病：一种植物病害，导致植物枯萎、死亡。
· The blights have destroyed many crops this year.
今年枯萎病破坏了许多庄稼。
v．破坏，损害：对某物或某人造成伤害或不利影响。
· The construction project blights the landscape.
这个建筑项目破坏了景观。

sentences.sentence: Manchester has social blights of its own.
sentences.translation: 曼彻斯特也有自己的顽疾。

sentences.sentence: OF ALL the blights afflicting the sea, carbon dioxide is just one.
sentences.translation: 在所有正折磨着大海的破坏分子中，二氧化碳只为其一。

sentences.sentence: Africa suffers from the resource curse, which blights countries nature made rich.
sentences.translation: 非洲遭受着资源诅咒，使国家无法致富。
